results.name: Smallest number k such that n! - k is a square
comment: Sequence is not monotonic: a(n) < a(n-1) for n = 12, 71, 90, 143, 145, 151, 172, 218, 257. - _Zak Seidov_, Jun 25 2013
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
program: (PARI) a(n)=my(N=n!); N-sqrtint(N)^2 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 25 2013
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 21 2002
